apple_vendor_description: Apple’s rendering of the man in a steamy room emoji showcases a person with a medium-light skin tone, captured in a moment of relaxation and rejuvenation. The design on Apple devices features subtle condensation effects and soft, diffused lighting that evokes the atmosphere of a warm, steamy environment, all rendered with Apple’s characteristic smooth gradients and rounded edges. This emoji on Apple devices is typically used to convey a sense of peace, well-being, or the enjoyment of a spa-like experience.
